topic: keyboard shortcuts that 10x your coding speed
hook: Say it louder: keyboard shortcuts that 10x your coding speed.

script_segments.text: Say it louder: keyboard shortcuts that 10x your coding speed.
script_segments.visual_direction: Black screen or face close-up. Big bold text fades in.

script_segments.text: keyboard shortcuts that 10x your coding speed doesn't need to be complicated. Stop overengineering it.
script_segments.visual_direction: Text reveal with dramatic zoom or shake. Let the line breathe.
Quick logo/handle flash. Loop-friendly — cuts back to start cleanly.

caption: I wish someone told me this about keyboard shortcuts that 10x your coding speed sooner.
